detail_desc: Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and a detachable fabric belt with a metal fastener.
Short, straight-style T-shirt dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, slightly wider neckline. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Gilet in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit. Width 30 cm, circumference approx. 125 cm.

Loose-fitting, ankle-length trousers in soft, gently draping Tencel™ lyocell twill with a high, paper bag waist, pleats at the top and a tie belt. Zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Metal hair grips decorated with beads in various shapes and colours.
Imitation leather trainers with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a soft, padded top edge. Mesh linings and insoles.
Boxy jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, metal sidepieces and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Swim pants with a laser-cut frilled trim at the top and narrow elastication at the waist. Lined gusset.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with concealed press-studs. Short sleeves and a seam at the waist with a sewn-in tie belt.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar, covered buttons at the top, wide, raglan sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and a softly draping, A-line skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps, an opening at the top, tasselled ties and a rounded hem.
Top in soft jersey with short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft, organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and a picot trim around the neckline and cuffs.
T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a round neckline and gently rounded hem.
Flared calf-length skirt in an airy, patterned weave with an elasticated waist and gathered tiers for added width. Lined.
Fitted jersey cropped top in a cotton blend with a print motif on the front.
Top in soft fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Maxi dress in an airy weave with braided details, a double layer at the top and a seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front. Long, raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Loose fit.
Loafers in velour with textile linings, quilted satin insoles and fluted soles.

Oversized jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Adjustable tabs at the sides and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
Lined, push-up triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Shoulder straps that join and tie at the back.
Ankle boots with a zip at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6 cm.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a small stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in a rib knit. Low-cut neckline with a twisted detail at the back.

Long, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a sheen. V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, and decorative pleats front and back.Glittery, embroidered trim at the neckline, down the front and at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles and straps at the back that can be wound around the ankle. Rubber soles.
Long-sleeved tops in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Mesh shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short, sequined dress made from recycled polyester in a straight style with wide grosgrain shoulder straps and a V-neck at the back with ties at the top. Lined.
Polo-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and shimmering imitation leather pendant.
Imitation leather trainers with a print motif, padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, side and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jumper in a soft knit with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Loose-fitting top in softly draping satin with a deep, lace-trimmed V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.

Knee-length, double-breasted coat in woven fabric with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.
Top in soft jersey containing glittery threads with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with pleats and ribbed trims.
Short top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a lace trim at the top and shoulder straps. Buttons down the front and a frill trim at the hem.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a high collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft mohair blend with long, slightly wider sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Dance shoes with elastic straps over the foot. Cotton linings and insoles and soft suede soles.

Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey in a slightly A-line style with a press-stud on one shoulder, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and slits in the sides. Slightly longer, rounded hem at the back.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short sleeves and a flounce down the front.

Off-the-shoulder, calf-length dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with elastication at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, an elasticated waist, and skirt with gathered seams. Unlined.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft jersey made from organic cotton with buttons at the top, elastication at the back and buttons at the sides. Seams on the legs with decorative buttons, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 0-12M.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a pile front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Pile and embroidered appliqués on the front.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Padded jacket in a lightly brushed, velvety-smooth weave with a stand-up collar, detachable hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Slightly longer at the back. Pile lining.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, mesh racer back and elasticated hem.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves, a frill trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Wide, boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit top in a soft, printed viscose blend with an unlined hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a decorative drawstring with a tie at the hem.
5-pocket jeans in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Cropped top in soft fabric with a round neckline and short sleeves. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Slightly wider sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, and flap chest pockets with a press-stud.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with glittery threads in the shaft.
Parka in soft, washed cotton twill with a detachable hood and a zip down the front. Lined.
Knee-length dress in jersey with a soft brushed finish. Boat neck, low dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves.
Long jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Straight style in a relaxed fit.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in a fine-knit with long raglan sleeves.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatshirt is organic. The polyester content is partly recycled.
Cotton canvas espadrilles with elastic gores in the sides and a braided jute trim around the soles. Cotton linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck front and back. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
